conclusion: When the light source moves forward, the shadows cast by the objects will change in both location and size.

The shadows will become longer and more elongated as the light source moves forward, due to the angle of the light rays becoming more oblique.
The shapes of the shadows might become more distorted due to the increased angle of the light, with outlines stretching particularly in the direction away from the light source.
